attributes.action: Pensions Regulator has stolen my pension
attributes.additional_details:
The Pensions Regulator has appointed Dalriada as a trustee of my Pension without my consent and held my pension fund for over 18 months without any feedback. The trustee has not fulfilled it's legal duty as a trustee (as per the Pension Trustees Toolkit).

A substantial amount of money has been stolen from me and I have been informed by Dalriada that I will see little or none of it returned as it was destined for an 'illegal' pension scheme.

The Pensions Regulator and Dalriada are sourcing all legal costs from my pension fund (and the funds of other members of similar schemes).

As I have received no benefit from this 'illegal' scheme I expect the Pensions department to return my Pension Fund in full (via the trustee).

rejection.details: This is correspondence on a personal issue
